existing_features.title: Update the mobile look/aim control so the player looks around by dragging on the right side of the screen (a large right-side touch area), rather than only inside the small circular "Look" widget.

Ensure the right-side look drag area correctly initializes and resets drag state on touch start/end so the first movement after touching down results in smooth look deltas (no requirement to "move once" before it starts responding).

new_feature_requests.summary: Change look/aim controls so the player looks around by dragging on the right side of the screen

projectName: Change mobile look controls to right-side screen drag
